item.title: CRWD Stock Hits Key Inflection Point Ahead of Earnings
item.description: CrowdStrike stock is holding near record highs ahead of earnings, with analysts bullish and traders positioning for major post-earnings moves

item.title: Rigetti’s Q3 Miss Reveals Quantum Funding and Timing Pressures
item.description: Rigetti’s Q3 miss and DARPA setback raise concerns about funding and its slow path to quantum advantage versus better-capitalized competitors

item.title: Monolithic Power Surges in 2025—Time to Buy or Hold?
item.description: Monolithic Power Systems has been winning in spite of NVIDIA. However, it could get a strong tailwind from Big Green in 2027 and beyond.

item.title: Tesla Has Been Trapped in a 10% Range for Months—What’s Going On?

item.title: dLocal Falls Despite Blowout Q3 Results—What Investors Are Missing
item.description: dLocal reported Q3 earnings that beat expectations, with revenue up 52% year over year and Total Payment Volume reaching a record $10.4 billion.
